mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDERS_NUMBER,O.ORDERS_DATE,O.ORDERS_TOTAL_AMOUNT,OI.ORDER_ITEM_NUMBER,OI.ORDER_ITEM_UNIT_PRICE,OI.ORDER_ITEM_QUANTITY,I.ITEM_TYPE,,I.ITEM_NAME FROM TBL_ORDERS O JOIN TBL_ORDER_ITEM OI ON O.ORDERS_NUMBER = OI.ORDERS_NUMBER JOIN TBL_ITEM I ON OI.ITEM_NUMBER = I.ITEM_NUMBER WHERE O.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} ORDER BY O.ORDERS_DATE DESC
